entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Assiniboia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 p.m. CST Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 19 April 2023
